page.title: 01Peak Forest
page.content: { Peak Forest}is a small village near Buxton.It is in the country.The area has plantations and farms with walls made of{limestone }.The A623 runs through the village joining Stockport and Chesterfield.The village has houses made mostly of limestone.There is a school,a garage,a shop,two churches,an inn and a telephone box.The shop is a general store selling food and hardware and has a Post Office in the corner.The pub is called the Devonshire Arms and is next to the school-they have a darts and dominoes night each week. Across the road from the pub is a recreation ground where there are swings,a football pitch and the school sports is held each year. There is a scramble track nearby for motor bikes and an annual sheep roast and fell race is held.
